subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: After leading Florida to two straight N.C.A.A. titles and building a budding dynasty in 11 years at the school, Billy Donovan is off to the N.B.A., ready to coach the Orlando Magic.
snippet: After leading Florida to two straight N.C.A.A. titles and building a budding dynasty in 11 years at the school, Billy Donovan is off to the N.B.A., ready to coach the Orlando Magic.
